name: Swipe Swipe Swipe
description:
Controls:

Click (or tap) and hold, then drag to create an attack.

- Attacks which touch enemies will deal damage (unless an enemy is blocking)

- Attacks which touch incoming, enemy attacks will deflect them

Tips:

- All enemies have pre-determined patterns they follow. Meaning you can predict their movements in advance.

- Try to both protect yourself and damage enemies when drawing your lines!

- Enemies can block (shown by an expanding blue circle). Weaknesses (green reticules) can show up indicating how to break their guard.

- Enemies  can have shields. Shields are 'limited use' and can be broken by attacking enemies repeatedly. 

Unfortunately, WebGL has some limitation when playing videos, so the in game instructions only work for the windows and android builds.

Music by KLY.
